items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: The proof type is a utility bill issued by London City Utilities, valid until 2023-12-31.
Ellipro survey scores available for 2020, 2021, and 2022 with validated financial data.
Bank account and SWIFT details are verified; address matches organization headquarters.
Director verification is incomplete; pending review for multiple identity documents.
Some tax documents require renewal or additional information for verification.
Industry license and environmental compliance are under review by respective authorities.
Verification of geographic coverage and employee range is pending.
No data available for PEP screening.
Revenue details are not included in the current dataset.
